text_block_list.text: Every time I saw the Derby, my feelings grew. Every time I saw the Derby, my dream swelled.
That feeling became a limited express ticket to lead to her victory
The name of the person who holds the limited express, is Winning Ticket.
Inspired by her feelings for the Derby, to create the best drama with her rivals, the fans kept raising their call of praise.
And then, this drama will never fade away even in the future, and a new drama will begin anewãƒ¼
